User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

uniqueCode.description: A unique 5-digit code assigned to the user upon account creation.

Caterer.title: Caterer
Caterer.description: Represents a caterer in the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Caterer entity.

isCanteenOpen.description: Indicates whether the canteen is open for orders.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order made by a user to a caterer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Order entity.

items.description: An array of items included in the order.

totalAmount.description: The total cost of the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

orderDate.description: The date the order was placed.

MenuItem.title: MenuItem
MenuItem.description: Represents a menu item offered by a caterer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the MenuItem entity.

catererId.description: The ID of the caterer who owns this menu item.

name.description: The name of the menu item.

description.description: A description of the menu item.

price.description: The price of the menu item.

available.description: Whether the menu item is currently available.

imageUrl.description: URL or data URI of the menu item's image.

category.description: The category of the menu item (e.g. 'breakfast', 'lunch').

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a menu category created by a caterer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

name.description: The name of the category (e.g., 'Breakfast', 'Specialty Pizzas').

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to ensure security, scalability, and efficient data access. The `MenuItem` entity now has a simple `category` string field, as categories are determined by AI and no longer need to be stored as a separate collection. The rest of the structure remains the same to support user profiles, caterer profiles, and order management with appropriate data segregation for security and querying efficiency.
